content: Hello CARIN. My name is John Zulim, an engineer on the CMS Blue Button program. We are working to implement the CARIN BB IG as we add R4 support to the BFD API. Could you tell me which CARIN BB EOB profile we should use for Carrier claims?

John Zulim said:

Hello CARIN. My name is John Zulim, an engineer on the CMS Blue Button program. We are working to implement the CARIN BB IG as we add R4 support to the BFD API. Could you tell me which CARIN BB EOB profile we should use for Carrier claims?

It would seem the team has determined we'll want to use the Professional/NonClinician...
